lines.text: Who came up with this ridiculous concept anyway? Resolve your entire life in one bold stroke? What if I fail? And I will. I'll fail. I'm telling you. I always fail. Then my whole life will be a complete failure.
No offense, Harrison. But you died a failure because you never tried.
He likes to play the field. He takes after me
A baboon in heat takes after you.
Funny. You're killing me, you're really killing me. Oh yeah, I'm already dead. I forgot
Hey, life's tough. Sometimes you don't get what you want. Mostly you don't get what you want.
You bug my ass! You've been bugging my ass since the early-'70s.

[to the person that caused his death]
I can't get a decent meal, I can't get a smoke, and mostly, I can't get laid. You turned me into a *goddamn* monk!
I like that, it adds unity.
